actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing support for cooperation between the Governments of Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina.

summary.text: Urges the Government of Croatia and the Government of Bosnia and Herzegovina to: (1) continue their military cooperation for the purpose of defending the territorial integrity of the Republic of Croatia and the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina; and (2) continue and strengthen their political and economic support for the Bosniac-Croat Federation. Calls on the U.S. Government to: (1) provide full support to such Federation; (2) uphold as a top policy objective preserving the self-government and territorial integrity of such Republics; and (3) oppose any peace settlement that would undermine this objective.

titles.title: A resolution expressing support for cooperation between the Governments of Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina.
